title: 1935년 Saenz 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Saenz. 판결일: 1935-04-17. 법원: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Ed SAENZ v. STATE
**판결일**: 1935-04-17
**법원**: Court of Criminal Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX

**판사**: Lattimore

## 변호인

J. A. Moyer, of San Antonio, for appellant., Lloyd W. Davidson, State’s Atty., of Austin, for the State.

## 인용

- 81 S.W.2d 1116

## 판결문 요약


LATTIMORE, Judge.
Conviction for robbery; punishment, eight years in the penitentiary.
The record is here without any statement of facts or bills of exception. All matters of procedure appear regular.
The judgment will be affirmed.
...
